attributes.action: use any means within his power to fight the current threat of Terrorism, and hate preached against the British People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people are concerned and quite rightly so, about the current threat to the lives of millions of British people, here in Great Britain. Concerns about the Megamosque being used for Terrorist training and safe haven. The threat to any British life that openly shows opposition to Islam. The hate and discrimination meated out against Britsh people, by extremists, and the slow decline of British traditions, ways and laws. These things contribute to a feeling of insecurity, which is making our society unstable, and the Government has to realise that there is NOt one religion or race here, but many, White Black Asian and many others. All have a right to the security and protection of the Government, and i call on the Primeminister to action this NOW...

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
